name: Minimal Maze
description:
A minimalist puzzle game with a modern visual design and simple geometric shapes.


  • The objective is simple, unite all the pieces between the blocks of different color.
  • Use only the mouse to rotate the pieces. The left button turns the piece counterclockwise and the right button clockwise.
  • The puzzles increase in difficulty as you pass the level.
  • Each level has the number of unique moves. Not one more or less.

Can you finish all the levels?
